sections.title: CyberFort Solutions
responsibilities: Oversaw scheduling, documentation, and progress tracking for internal IT infrastructure upgrades.
Worked alongside security analysts to identify workflow bottlenecks and recommend process improvements.
Assisted in communication between vendors and reviewed contracts for third-party software providers.

sections.title: BrightWave Digital
responsibilities: Coordinated deadlines and deliverables for a cross-functional team handling client advertising campaigns.
Curated internal status reports summarizing campaign metrics, budget usage, and upcoming project milestones.
Developed foundational practices in agile project management tools and team collaboration platforms.

sections.title: DeltaNova Technologies
responsibilities: Streamlined project documentation and meeting records to support efficient product launch execution.
Engaged in client update calls, providing project status recaps and next-step outlines.
Prepared post-project reviews that uncovered a 15% increase in team efficiency opportunities and documented best practices.

sections.title: CareerOS Academy
responsibilities: Engaged in comprehensive coursework on Agile methodologies, risk management, and stakeholder analysis; led a capstone project simulating a cross-functional product launch.

sections.title: CareerOS Academy
responsibilities: Completed coursework in corporate finance, marketing strategy, and organizational behavior; collaborated on a consulting project for a local startup to optimize operations.

sections.description: President of the Data Analytics Club at CareerOS Academy
